name: Magical Girl Game Juice: Attack!
description:
Its Eyeoni hunting season on Cloud Kingdom, and you practiced the whole year to defeat as many monsters as possible! Get Wand pickups to blow all enemies around.

Magical Girls Game Juice: Attack! is an "Maho Shojo Anime" inspired FPS survival game, where you play as a powerful witch.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2nd Tazmen Jam.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space Bar: Jump

LMB: Shoot

Developers: 

Rafael Vital @rafavla32

Danilo Ribeiro @scharma

Tássio Miranda @isittacio

Music by the awesome @monplaisirmusic, from the album "Poupi's incredible adventures!", avaiable for free at FreeMusicArchive.org!
